entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Cluedo: Classic Edition
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • Ultimate Detective Collection：USD 19.99 → USD 14.99 [USD 14.99 ~ USD 19.99]

全部价格信息

价格：USD 6.99

App 內購買項目

  • Snowy Peaks Theme：USD 6.99
  • Ultimate Detective's Package：USD 34.99
  • Ultimate Detective Collection：USD 14.99

应用描述

THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - It’s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? There’s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin! • A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, that’s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime! • A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: “was it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Room”, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers! • CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Don’t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery. • FAMILY FRIENDLY - It’s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases it’s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery! • SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion! • ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out who’s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Don’t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are! • 10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detective’s Package. Listed under “Editor’s Choice” for the Most Stylish Game, our exclusive original themes are hand crafted by our studio artists. o Tudor Mansion: The guests at this party have turned out to be a lethal combination! o Vampire Castle: In a household where every suspect is a monster, who committed the crime? o Egyptian Adventure: Solve the crime, from the dark tombs of pharaohs to the crumbling pyramids! o Hollywood: In a land where life is an act, can you find the truth in the fairytale? o Murder Express: Challenge your friends to solve a mystery based on a classic Agatha Christie novel! o Sherlock: Become the great detective and solve a crime on the dark streets of London! o Snowy Peaks: Old friends have been reunited. Tensions are running high, but whose grudge ran that deep? o Tropical Mystery: Someone has rocked this boat in a big way! It’s a luxury race to the answer! o Venetian Masquerade: Historic Venice is beautiful, but crime lurks beneath the surface! o Wild West: From the jailhouse to the saloon, the story of Dr. Black’s end will spread far and wide. Only you can discover the truth! About Marmalade Game Studio At Marmalade Game Studio we make quality, premium multiplayer board games. Play our classic games, including Monopoly and The Game of Life 2, anywhere on your mobile! Enjoy with your friends and family whether you’re together or apart. You can find the fun with people you know or players around the world. Our games are ad-free, family friendly fun. For quality time, look for the Marmalade Game Studio logo.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

The Secret Elevator Remastered — an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 5.99 → USD 2.99 [USD 2.99 ~ USD 5.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：USD 2.99

App 內購買項目

  • Orbit Pack：USD 4.99

应用描述

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 6.99 → USD 1.99 [USD 1.99 ~ USD 6.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：USD 1.99

App 內購買項目

  • Forbidden Bundle：USD 6.99
  • The Exile：USD 4.99
  • The Ghoul：USD 1.99
  • The Priest：USD 1.99
  • The Dancer：USD 1.99

应用描述

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. • Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. • Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. • A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... • The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal • The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened • The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit • The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
entry.id: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验-mo-1749464047049
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 0.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • 买断制VIP：USD 9.99
  • 月度VIP：USD 0.99
  • 1年VIP：USD 1.99

应用描述

想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？ 这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！ 医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！ 1. 【速诊挑战】 1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断 2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！） 3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战 4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师 2. 【赛博护士】 1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验 2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们 3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关 4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果 3. 【赛博医生】 1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病； 2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病 3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断 特色功能 1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计 2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜 3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯 4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手 用户真实评价 "下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" "原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" "医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。 立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

entry.title: Deco: Wallpaper Creator
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 2.99 → USD 0.99 [USD 0.99 ~ USD 2.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：USD 0.99

应用描述

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine. Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours. Create Your Vibe: Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds – Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it. Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks. Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast. Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme. Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*. Add Your Personal Touch: Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like – they'll look great even on different screen sizes! Simple, Powerful, Yours: Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025. (Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.) (iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.) Privacy Policy: https://docs.aethers.world/deco/privacypolicy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊
entry.id: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊-mo-1749439044822
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 9.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 9.99]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • 500張 換購券：USD 9.99
  • 200張 換購券：USD 4.99
  • 50張 換購券：USD 1.99
  • 黃金認證：USD 1.99

应用描述

經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完. 由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點. 保證你可以玩到下一個十年. 遊戲重點: - 防禦你的基地 - 摧毀所有敵方坦克 - 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖 無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影. 遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 灵感卡片 - 创意笔记
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.99 → 免費 [免費 ~ USD 0.99]）

全部价格信息
